alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 8:00AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Mill Creek Near Nolensville affecting Davidson County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Mill Creek Near Nolensville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water begins to inundate low lying areas along the creek, including property near Bell Rd and Blue Hole Rd, and the athletic fields near Lighthouse Christian School. Water may also approach low lying areas near the Chandler Harris bridge on Nolensville Pike, including portions of Culbertson Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8 AM CST Thursday the stage was 13.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CST.
